languages.text: "Нет. Это предательство не меняет ничего. Оно лишь подтверждает, что все нечисты, даже преподобный Иеронимус. А значит тем важнее моя миссия — изгонять нечистое, дабы угодное Ему торжествовало. С преподобным я разберусь сама, но сначала избуду вашу скверну".

traits.locale_text: "Нет". {n}Инцендия холодно взирает на вас, суровые глаза лучатся светом.{/n} "Это предательство не меняет ничего. Оно лишь подтверждает, что все нечисты, даже отче Иеронимус. А значит тем важнее моя миссия — изгонять нечистое, дабы чистое расцвело. С преподобным я разберусь сама, но сначала избуду вашу скверну".
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "No. This betrayal changes nothing. It merely proves that no one is pure, not even Reverend Hieronymus. That makes my mission of banishing impurity all the more important for the triumph of what is agreeable to Him. I will deal with the reverend myself, once I have stamped out your corruption."
languages.original_text: "Нет. Это предательство не меняет ничего. Оно лишь подтверждает, что все нечисты, даже преподобный Иеронимус. А значит тем важнее моя миссия — изгонять нечистое, дабы угодное Ему торжествовало. С преподобным я разберусь сама, но сначала избуду вашу скверну".

That makes my mission of banishing impurity all the more important for the triumph of what is agreeable to Him. I will deal with the Reverend myself, once I have stamped out your corruption."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "No. This betrayal changes nothing. It merely proves that no one is pure, not even Reverend Hieronymus. That makes my mission of banishing impurity all the more important for the triumph of what is agreeable to Him. I will deal with the reverend myself, once I have stamped out your corruption."

languages.text: “不，他的背叛不会改变任何事情。这只能证明没有任何人是无罪的，就连希罗尼穆斯牧师也不例外。这让我明白，驱逐污秽的使命无比重要，这是为了让神皇的信仰获得胜利。等我消灭了你的腐化之后，我就会亲自审判希罗尼穆斯牧师。”
languages.original_text: "No. This betrayal changes nothing. It merely proves that no one is pure, not even Reverend Hieronymus. That makes my mission of banishing impurity all the more important for the triumph of what is agreeable to Him. I will deal with the reverend myself, once I have stamped out your corruption."

traits.locale_text: “不，他的背叛不会改变任何事情。这只能证明没有任何人是无罪的，就连希罗尼穆斯牧师也不例外。这让我明白，驱逐污秽的使命无比重要，这是为了让神皇的信仰获得胜利。等我消灭了你的腐化之后，我就会亲自审判希罗尼穆斯牧师。”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「いいや。この裏切りは何も変えない。ヒエロニムス司祭を含む誰もが、純粋ではないという証拠になっただけだ。だからこそ、不純物を追放するという私の使命は、主にとって喜ばれることを勝ち取る上で、より重要なのだ。その堕落を片付けた後で、司祭は私が始末する」
languages.original_text: "No. This betrayal changes nothing. It merely proves that no one is pure, not even Reverend Hieronymus. That makes my mission of banishing impurity all the more important for the triumph of what is agreeable to Him. I will deal with the reverend myself, once I have stamped out your corruption."

traits.locale_text: 「いいや。この裏切りは何も変えない。ヒエロニムス司祭を含む誰もが、純粋ではないという証拠になっただけだ。だからこそ、不純物を追放するという私の使命は、主にとって喜ばれることを勝ち取る上で、より重要なのだ。その堕落を片付けた後で、司祭は私が始末する」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «No. Esta traición no cambia nada. Simplemente prueba que nadie es puro, ni siquiera el reverendo Hieronymus. Eso hace que mi misión de desterrar la impureza sea aún más importante para el triunfo de lo que le agrada a Él. Me encargaré del reverendo una vez que haya erradicado la corrupción».
languages.original_text: "No. This betrayal changes nothing. It merely proves that no one is pure, not even Reverend Hieronymus. That makes my mission of banishing impurity all the more important for the triumph of what is agreeable to Him. I will deal with the reverend myself, once I have stamped out your corruption."

traits.locale_text: «No. Esta traición no cambia nada. Simplemente prueba que nadie es puro, ni siquiera el padre Hieronymus. Eso hace que mi misión de desterrar la impureza sea aún más importante para el triunfo de lo que le agrada a Él. Me encargaré del reverendo una vez que haya erradicado la corrupción».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Nein. Dieser Verrat ändert nichts. Er beweist lediglich, dass niemand rein ist, nicht einmal Reverend Hieronymus. Das macht meine Mission, die Unreinheit zu verbannen, nur umso wichtiger für den Triumph dessen, was dem Imperator gefällt. Ich kümmere mich selbst um den Reverend, sobald ich Eure Verderbnis getilgt habe."
languages.original_text: "No. This betrayal changes nothing. It merely proves that no one is pure, not even Reverend Hieronymus. That makes my mission of banishing impurity all the more important for the triumph of what is agreeable to Him. I will deal with the reverend myself, once I have stamped out your corruption."

traits.locale_text: "Nein. Dieser Verrat ändert nichts. Er beweist lediglich, dass niemand rein ist, nicht einmal Vater Hieronymus. Das macht meine Mission, die Unreinheit zu verbannen, nur umso wichtiger für den Triumph dessen, was dem Imperator gefällt. Ich kümmere mich selbst um den Reverend, sobald ich Eure Verderbnis getilgt habe."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « Non. Cette trahison ne change rien ; elle prouve simplement que personne n'est pur, pas même le révérend Hiéronymus. Cela rend ma mission d'autant plus importante et me pousse à redoubler d'efforts pour bannir l'impureté afin que triomphent les préceptes de l'Empereur. Je m'occuperai du révérend moi-même, dès que je vous aurai {mf|purgé|purgée} de votre corruption. »
languages.original_text: "No. This betrayal changes nothing. It merely proves that no one is pure, not even Reverend Hieronymus. That makes my mission of banishing impurity all the more important for the triumph of what is agreeable to Him. I will deal with the reverend myself, once I have stamped out your corruption."

traits.locale_text: « Non. Cette trahison ne change rien ; elle prouve simplement que personne n'est pur, pas même le père Hiéronymus. Cela rend ma mission d'autant plus importante et me pousse à redoubler d'efforts pour bannir l'impureté afin que triomphent les préceptes de l'Empereur. Je m'occuperai du révérend moi-même, dès que je vous aurai {mf|purgé|purgée} de votre corruption. »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Hayır. Bu ihanet bir şeyi değiştirmez. Yalnızca hiç kimsenin, Muhterem Hieronymus'un bile saf olmadığını ispatlar. O'nun gözünde kabul görenin zaferi adına, saf olmayanı yok etme vazifemi daha da önemli kılar. Muhterem ile bizzat ilgileneceğim. Senin yozluğunun kökünü kazıdıktan sonra."
languages.original_text: "No. This betrayal changes nothing. It merely proves that no one is pure, not even Reverend Hieronymus. That makes my mission of banishing impurity all the more important for the triumph of what is agreeable to Him. I will deal with the reverend myself, once I have stamped out your corruption."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır. Bu ihanet hiçbir şeyi değiştirmez. Yalnızca kimsenin, Muhterem Hieronymus'un bile saf olmadığını ispatlar. O'nun kabul ettiği eylemlerin zaferi adına saf olmayan şeyleri yok etme görevimi daha da önemli hâle getirir. Muhterem'le kendim ilgileneceğim. Senin yozlaşmanın kökünü kazıdıktan sonra."
traits.speaker: Chorda
